orign:
[00:17.670]I'm hoping you weren't heaven sent
[00:25.450]Cause only hell knows where you've been
[00:33.520]Your built composure's wearing thin
[00:41.730]And all your walls are caving in
[00:48.910]Before you shut this down
[00:51.870]I just wanna lift you up
[00:55.990]I'll take all this love I found
[01:00.120]And I hope that it's enough
[01:04.170]I saw you, yeah you,
[01:08.210]you're breaking down
[01:12.450]I hope you, yeah you,
[01:16.440]you come around
[01:21.440]Now don't you shut this down
[01:24.610]ooh no don't you give this up
[01:28.930]I took all this love I found
[01:33.130]and I hope that it's enough
[01:36.910]Is it enough?
[01:38.830]If we don't bend then this might break
[01:46.810]Please don't give into this pain
[01:54.860]Just keep on counting down the days
[02:03.020]And dream of me to keep you safe
[02:10.310]Don't you shut this down
[02:13.800]No, don't you give this up
[02:17.570]I took all this love I found
[02:22.300]and I hope that it's enough
[02:25.510]I saw you, yeah you,
[02:29.600]you're breaking down
[02:33.820]I hope you, yeah you,
[02:37.710] you come around
[02:42.770]Now don't you shut this down
[02:45.840]oh no don't you give this up
[02:49.700]I took all this love I found
[02:54.500]and I hope that it's enough
[02:58.040]Is it enough?
[03:47.990]Don't you shut this down
[03:51.980]Don't you give this up
[03:56.050]Don't you shut this down
[04:00.060]Don't you give this up
[04:04.190]Before you came around
[04:07.380]I was lost and out of place
[04:11.470]You're the only love I found
[04:16.080]and I'm hoping that you'll stay
[04:24.000]Please stay
[04:27.890]Please stay
[04:31.980]Please stay
trans:
[by:沉鱼腥]
[00:17.67]我一直祈盼你并非天赐
[00:25.45]鬼才知道你的行踪
[00:33.52]你佯装的镇定愈来愈单薄了
[00:41.73]你的壁垒也渐渐塌陷
[00:48.91]在你喊停之前
[00:51.87]我只是想撑起你
[00:55.99]我会收藏好我拾到的爱恋
[01:00.12]这就够了
[01:04.17]我看见你了 是你
[01:08.21]逐渐崩溃的你
[01:12.45]我希望你 是你
[01:16.44]回到我身边的你
[01:21.44]我不准你现在喊停
[01:24.61]不准你现在放手
[01:28.93]我收好了我拾到的爱恋
[01:33.13]我多想就这样满足
[01:36.91]但足矣吗
[01:38.83]若我们不让步 这一切都将毁灭
[01:46.81]求你了 不要陷入这般痛苦
[01:54.86]只要数着日子
[02:03.02]梦着我 就让你安稳
[02:10.31]不准你喊停
[02:13.80]不准你放手
[02:17.57]我收好了我拾到的爱恋
[02:22.30]我多想就这样满足
[02:25.51]我看见你了 是你
[02:29.60]逐渐崩溃的你
[02:33.82]我希望你 是你
[02:37.71]回到我身边的你
[02:42.77]我不准你现在喊停
[02:45.84]不准你现在放手
[02:49.70]我收好了我拾到的爱恋
[02:54.50]我多想就这样满足
[02:58.04]但足矣吗
[03:47.99]不准你喊停
[03:51.98]不准你放手
[03:56.05]不准你喊停
[04:00.06]不准你放手
[04:04.19]在你回来之前
[04:07.38]我失去了自我 不知所以
[04:11.47]你是我好不容易找到的挚爱
[04:16.08]所以我期望你能留下来
[04:24.00]所以留下来吧
[04:27.89]请你留下来吧
[04:31.98]求你留下来吧
